post.body: We just finished watching Muppet Christmas Carol and playing a very silly game. <3 fambly.
...Eek. (in the traditional sense)
I'll be here, bringing the lulz whenever I'm not with my fambly. :P
Apologies if I start rambling. I'll facebook message you instead.
Hee!
Slightly nervous now. *g* Probably will be moreso in the morning.
I may have to balance it out with filthy humor, just to keep the balance in the universe.
Once my sister gets home tomorrow night, we're so watching that.
I'll be sure to warn him to be on his Best Behavior then. *g*
Playing blockles while waiting for Yuletide to go up.
Films to see over break: Milk, Slumdog Millionaire, Quantum of Solace, Seven Pounds, The Spirit.
So I've heard there's a new puppie-cam since the Shiba Inu's got too big. Anyone have links?
Also, those who offered advice/threats/hugs/etc, you're Made of Win: @hidama @sluys @ginnyjake and anyone else I may have missed. <3
That could have gone a lot worse. He doesn't hate me, but he did say he was blindsided by it. It's over, now I can stop stressing.
Resolving to not worry about it too much until tonight, when he'll likely be online.
Well, shit. First date = more awkward than Mike O date 2 yrs ago. I don't think this is going to work. Now I just need to tell him that.
Slumdog Millionaire, Milk, and In Search of a Midnight Kiss are all at Fleur Cinema in Des Moines. I may have to go see all of those soon.
I really hope my mother doesn't do this with every guy I date. "But you might end up with Dan in the end! Wouldn't that be nice?"
The screenname of one of my friends on MSN is currently "I've got the curse of curves." It worries me.
It just hit me that I have a date tomorrow. *flails a little*
